novel_reference.chapter_file: 三國志演義_章節/001-第一回-宴桃園豪傑三結義，斬黃巾英雄首立功.md
novel_reference.excerpt_zh: 生得身長七尺五寸，兩耳垂肩，雙手過膝，目能自顧其耳，面如冠玉，脣若塗脂。
notes_en: Long earlobes that visually stand out from the jawline.
Jade-like face: composed, dignified, and gentle expression.
Red-tinted lips with clear mouth shape (not merged into skin tone).
